MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL11 postcode area of Minera affecting properties in Ruthin Road  and surrounding area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.12PM due to a grounded overhead line. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.14PM on 8th February 2021
